item.coloph: mtho bcun grub rjes bagsi-yin jokiyagsan ilanggui-a ketürkei magtagal tegüsbe : enedkeg-ün ubadyai sarvajnadeva-lug-a yekede tokiyaldugulugci kelemürci pande rinchen mchog orcigulbai : qoyin-a pande dpal-brcegs raksita orcigulugad nayiragulju nuta-dur bagulgabai :: töbed bicig-ün ded surgaguli-yin bagsi böged lung-fu-se-yin jasag blama sönid-ün bstanjin chos-dar dgeslong monggolcilan orcigulbai

item.mng: ilanggui-a ketürkei magtagal-un aqui yeke nomlal orusiba
item.coloph: mtho bcun grub rjes bagsi-yin jokiyagsan burqan bagsi-yin magtagal ilanggui-a ketürkei magtagal-un aqui yeke nomlal-i umar-a jüg-ün köbci-dür bolugsan: bhanggala orun-u prajna-varm-a bagsi-yi jokiyagsan tegüsbei : : enedkeg-ün ubadyai pandita carandan-a-lug-a yekede tokiyaldugulugci kelemürci ayag-g-a tekimlig rinchenbzangpo orcigulugad nayiragulju nuta-dur bagulgabai:: sedkil-i qudqugci saran tirim tü be sira debel-tü: vid sastir üiledügci andi ba blamrika : delger arsi ilagun üligci gajar-un köbegün köl-iyen qaragci muni braqasbadi asuri-yin ejed-ün : naran urug obug-tan-dur törügsen abural gurban sansar-un blam-a tere sakyalig-ud-un qagan-u cadig jokiyal-dur ülü tengceldügül-ün magtagsan : tere magtagal-un tayilburi tegün-i ende tegüskebei:: tere buyan-iyar sansar-un siltegen-i bidügci: bi kemen barimtalaqui-yin qarangqui-dur tögürigsen: tirtikener-ün qaranggui-yi darun üiledügci : ilagugsan-u naran bolqu minu boltugai :: ilangguy-a ketürkei magtagal-un aqui yeke nomlal prajna varm-a bagsi-yin jokiyagsan-aca üy-e jabsar-un arban qoyar silüg-ün tayilburi-yin enedkeg sudur-i ese olugad : qoyici cag-tur sakyalig-un ayag-g-a tekimlig ananda dovaccha sayin cogtu kemegdekü: cogtu sasky-a-yin buqar keyid-tür nayiragulugsan tegüsbe : töbed bicig-ün ded surgaguli-yin bagsi böged lung-fu-se-yin jasag blam-a sönid-ün bstanjin chosdar dgeslon monggolcilun orcigulbai ::

item.mng: yeke erketü qamug-i ayiladugci burqan-umagtagal kemegdekü
item.coloph: yeke erketü gamug-i ayiladugci burqan-u magtagal kemegdekü : biraman ubasi mto-bcun grubrje bagsi-yin jokiyagsan tegüsbei :: enedkeg-ün ubadyai jarandan-a-lug-a : yekede tokiyaldugulugci kelemürci ratn-a bhadr-a orcigulbai: : töbed bicig-ün ded surgaguli-yin bagsi böged lung-fu-se-yin jasag blam-a sönid-ün bstanjin chosdar dgeslong monggolcilan orcigulbai ::

enedkeg-ü ubadyai sarvajnä deva lochcaba bande rinchen mchog orcigulbai: yekede tokiyaldugulugci kelemürci bande dpal-brcegs raksita nayiragulun nuta-dur bagulgabai : : töbed bicg-ün ded surgaguli-yin bagsi böged lung-fu-se-yin jasag blam -a sönid-ün bstanjin chosdar dgeslong monggolcilan orcigulbai :

item.mng: tngri-dece ketürkei bolugsan-u magtagal-un tayilburi orusiba
nom-un bey-e-dür orusigsan yerüngkei busu erdem-ün magtagal orusiba
simnus nomugadqaqui-da masi bayasqulang-tu tngri-yin gegen-ü magtagal
